summary: A frozen text embedding component that utilizes a pre‑trained OpenCLIP transformer encoder to convert input text into fixed‑size vector representations, providing helper methods for encoding, pooling, and forward propagation while keeping the model parameters immutable.
business_intent: Supply downstream systems (e.g., semantic search, recommendation, classification) with high‑quality, ready‑to‑use text embeddings without requiring further model training, ensuring fast and reliable inference.
